definition[0]: the sixth letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the fourth note in the musical scale1(8) of C major or the musical key based on this note
definition[2]: a mark given to a student’s work to show that it is not good enough
example[0]: I got an F in chemistry.
definition[3]: the written abbreviation of forte, used in music to show that a part should be played or sung loudly
